attributes.action: Significantly reduce immigration into the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: High levels of immigration over the past 50 years have led to a large increase in population which has contributed significantly to an ongoing urbanization  that has threatened our countryside and our culture. It has led to increasing pressure on public services and infrastructure. Finally a Lords committee on economic affairs recently concluded that high levels of immigration lead to no net economic benefit for existing UK citizens.

rejection.details: Your petition is similar to this one http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/actanonverba/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
